ComicInfo.Title: New York City Signing; Diner; World Cup; Did This Ever Happen to You?; Uncapped; Grocery Shopping; Unintentional Cruelty; Today I Am a Mouse
ComicInfo.Summary:
Harvey feels unwell during his New York signing schedule for The Quitter.
Harvey and Joyce pick up a meal on their way round to a friend.
Harvey watches the 2006 World Cup Final and afterward learns about a jazz trio.
Harvey's phone stops working.
An incident from Harvey's time working in a bottling plant.
Harvey goes shopping.
A broken toilet brings Harvey closer to a neighbour.
